message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $15000.  This price reflects the significant value and quality of the product. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13500?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand you're looking for a good deal. While I'm willing to negotiate, $13500 is still a bit low for me. How about we split the difference and go with $14250?  This price is fair and reflects the product's value.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $14250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about we try $13750? This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
